item.description:
Calling all public radio lovers and trivia buffs, especially Wait wait Don't Tell me fans. Wait Wait live let's you witness a live taping of the show beamed live in hi-def from New York.

Watch as the quiz plays out live in addition to other goodness like musical performances and surprise guests.

If you're a fan of the radio show, this should make for a great experience.

Showcase Cinemas in Warwick will be broadcasting the show. Tickets cost $23 and can be bought online (www.fathomevents.com) or at the venue.

(A bit more than your average movie, but not bad if you consider you're supporting public broadcasting.)

Â 

For more information and ticketing info:

http://www.fathomevents.com/#!wait-wait-dont-tell-me-live

Make sure to get tickets for the Warwick Cinema venue.

I'm buying online to make sure I don't have to deal with a sellout.

See you there
item.how_to_find_us: Lets meet in the lobby a few minutes before showtime
item.name: Wait wait don't tell me!!! Livecast
